MajorClaims.Text: both of studying hard and playing sports are part of life to children
both studying hard at school and playing sports can improve children's future

Claims.Text: studying hard will give children a better future
playing sports will give good effects on children

Premises.Text: Studying hard gives children with a plenty of knowledge and skills for their future
children who always studying hard and getting high achievement, it will be easy to pass qualification for work and they are more likely to find great work at multinational company
If they working at multinational company as the result is they can earn higher salary
when you always studying harder than others you will get best results
there are many benefit when children doing sport
children who always playing sport like football, they will be active as a person and learn to become team-player
It will be good for children
indirectly they will learn how to socialize each other as a team
That will make children getting lots of friends
they can contribute positively to community
playing sport makes children getting healthy and become children's well-being
